oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest

Class MVSRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mvsuggest.MVSRepository

  • public class MVSRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads an holds layers templates from the MVSuggest repository.

    hsaucedo

        public static final GeoAreaInfo EMPTY_RESULT

    • Constructor Detail

      • MVSRepository

        public MVSRepository(boolean keepTemplates,
                     boolean includeFeaturesGeometries,
                     boolean useFeatureCentroids)
        Creates a new instance
        Parameters:
        keepTemplates - whether the templates JSON contents should be kept in memory
        includeFeaturesGeometries - whether the templates features geometries should be included
        useFeatureCentroids - whether the templates feature geometries should be converted to centroids. This parameter is ignored if includeFeaturesGeometries is set to false

    • Method Detail

      • containsTemplates

        public boolean containsTemplates()
        Tells whether the templates JSON contents are contained
        Returns:

      • getFeatureInfo

        public GeoAreaInfo getFeatureInfo(java.lang.String layer,
                                  java.lang.String featureId)
        Gets the information of the feature identified by the layer name and feature id. The information will
        Parameters:
        layer - a layer name
        featureId - a feature id
        Returns:
        a GeoAreaInfo containing the feature information

      • getLayers

        public java.lang.String[] getLayers()
        Gets the names of all the contained layers
        Returns:
        an array of layer names

      • getTemplate

        public java.lang.String getTemplate(java.lang.String layer)
        Gets the template JSON content of the specified layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - the name of a layer contained in the repository
        Returns:
        the layer's JSON template or null if the repository was not configured to keep templates.

      • loadTemplate

        public void loadTemplate(java.lang.String layer,
                         Path templatePath,
                         Configuration conf)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the template file of the given layer from the path specified
        Parameters:
        layer - a layer name
        templatePath - the path where the template is located
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                  throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        layer - a layer name
        jsonTemplate - the template`s JSON content

      • loadTemplates

        public void loadTemplates(java.lang.String[] layers,
                          Path templatesPath,
                          Configuration conf)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Loads and parses the template files of the given layers from the path specified.
        Parameters:
        layers - an array of layer names
        templatesPath - the path where the template files are located
        conf - the job configuration
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
